Package foundry.veil.api.client.render.shader.processor

Interface ShaderPreProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShaderBindingProcessor, ShaderCPreprocessor, ShaderCustomProcessor, ShaderImportProcessor, ShaderLineProcessor, ShaderModifyProcessor, ShaderMultiProcessor, ShaderPredefinitionProcessor, ShaderVersionProcessor
public interface ShaderPreProcessor
Modifies the source code of a shader before compilation.

  • Method Details

    • prepare

      default void prepare()
      Called once when a shader is first run through the pre-processor.

    • modify

      String modify(ShaderPreProcessor.Context ctx, String source) throws IOException
      Modifies the specified shader source input.
      Parameters:
      ctx - Context for modifying shaders
      source - The GLSL source code to modify
      Returns:
      The modified source or the input if nothing changed
      Throws:
      IOException - If any error occurs while editing the source
